title: I found
description: Please read the QR code on the item
code: Please enter the code you found
step1Desc: When you find a lost item, check the QR code or label on it.
step2Desc: Enter the code from the item into the form below and add your contact information.
step3Desc: A notification is automatically sent to the item's owner and contact is established.
formDesc: Please fill out the form completely so we can contact the item's owner.
helpReason1Desc: Help someone get their valuable item back and brighten their day.
helpReason2Desc: Contribute to the development of a culture of trust and cooperation in our community.
helpReason3Desc: The good you do today can come back to you tomorrow. Kindness is contagious!
updateError: An error occurred while authorizing, please check the information.
thanks: Your notification was sent successfully, thank you!
